Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since this is your first time with us at
<clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>...
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>I worked hard making that map of them!
You won't find one like it anywhere else.
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> I find myself so captivated by that
painting of the cherry-blossom tree.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>It really captures the warm, inviting hue of
the cherry-blossom petals. <sp:5:0:0>So beautiful!
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Looks like you've <clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>.
Since this is also the first time you've
used <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>...
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I see that you've <clr:0000>lodged with us<clr:ffff>. Since
it's also your first visit to <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>...
Com_Photo_01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_00>What with the Upheaval and all, these are
some troubled times. I'd like to show a
picture that puts folks at ease.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>A picture of a cherry-blossom tree would
be good, since we have a map of them
already hung up here.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff> has one,
and I've heard folks say it's enchanting.
Something really special.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I'd love to paint a marvel like that
cherry-blossom tree...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'd go paint it if I had time.<sp:5:0:0> But I never do. If only
I saw a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> of it...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Sad_00>Thanks to you, Link, this painting
has brought a beautiful splash of color
to the stable.
A tree like that, why, I can't imagine all
the things it's seen.
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Anyway,<sp:5:0:0> did you want to do something
with my <clr:0000>picture of a cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>?
Receive04:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>One last thing! Have you already seen the
<clr:0000>Zonai ruins<clr:ffff> at Digdogg Bridge?

You can get there by heading west down
this road to a three-way intersection,
then turning south.
I've heard that the Zonai ruins that
showed up there are the <clr:0000>biggest in
the world<clr:ffff>.
Well, I thought it sounded interesting.
If you haven't seen 'em yet, you should
take a look.
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_00>What with the Upheaval and all, these are
some troubled times. I'd like to show a
picture that puts folks at ease.
Say, Link, do you know about
cherry-blossom trees?<sp:5:0:0> They've got
the prettiest pink flowers.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>We actually have a map of them hung up
next to the picture frame.<sp:5:0:0> Did you see it?

<sp:3:0:2:0801><clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff> has one,
and I've heard folks say it's enchanting.
Something really special.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I'd love to paint a marvel like that
cherry-blossom tree...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>I'd go paint it if I had time.<sp:5:0:0> But I never do. If only
I saw a <clr:0000>picture<clr:ffff> of it...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Do you have <clr:0000>a picture of the
cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>?
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Ah! Sir! <sp:5:0:0>You can't just take things from
the stable as you please!

<sp:3:0:2:0001>That decoration there is kind of lucky
to have around these days. The Stable
Association said I should hang it up.
They're made in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> over to
the east in the Necluda region.
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Did you see our stable's map of
cherry-blossom trees?

I think we need a picture of a cherry-
blossom tree to put next to it. That would
really put customers at ease.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I bet the <clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff> to the
<clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>on <clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff> would
make for a nice painting!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>It's supposed to be absolutely
enchanting to look at.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Ah! Sir! <sp:5:0:0>I told you, you can't just take
things from our stable!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>If you want your own, you'll just have to
go buy one.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>They're made in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> over to
the east in the Necluda region.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> You have <clr:0000>a picture of the
cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>?!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh! That's a <clr:0000>map of cherry-blossom trees<clr:ffff>.
I made it by gathering information from
customers at our stable.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>Just a picture would do. If I had some kind
of reference for <clr:0000>a cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>,
I could paint a copy.
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The closest cherry-blossom tree from
here is <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>, on <clr:0000>Satori Mountain<clr:ffff>.

When you <clr:0000>make an offering to the tree<clr:ffff>,
a <clr:0000>mysterious creature <clr:ffff>will appear!

Or at least, that's the legend...
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I was hoping to see <clr:0000>a picture of a
cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>. If you have one
of those, please, let me see it!
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Destroy your own property, please.


<sp:3:0:2:0201>Go buy one of those in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
in Necluda to the east of here. Then do
whatever you like to it.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Cherry-blossom trees are beautiful trees
with pink flowers.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I knew this would make a great picture!<sp:5:0:0>
It's just as heartwarming as I imagined.

I'd paint myself a new copy of a
<clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff> anytime you
want to bring one in.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>So, if you think another painting of the
blossoms will look better, just show me
a new picture.
Talk1006:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm. <sp:5:0:0>What should I put in that frame?<sp:5:0:0> A picture of a
cherry-blossom tree might be nice...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Photo_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The petals have such a delicate color.
I can hardly believe something that lovely
exists in the world...
<snd:Ease_01>Seeing it in full bloom makes me feel
warm in my very soul.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think_00>One day I'll go and see a blooming
cherry-blossom tree out there in nature.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>But for now, I can settle for looking at this
wonderful picture you gave me!
Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think>Oh, the splendid and wondrous
<clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>...

If I could paint it and display its beauty,
I think it would put folks' hearts at ease.
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Ahhh, I would just love to see a
cherry-blossom tree with my own eyes!
